Text: direct access I left you a voice mail message but didnt want to miss you Im working on the whole direct access issue and wanted to talk to you about the PUC putting it on the June agenda and how it would impact the MOU Give me a call if you have a chance Kate Kate Berry Reporter The Orange County Register w c

Enron drops direct access for residential customers Im writing the direct access story that you and I spoke about but now Im hearing that Enron is cutting off direct access for residential customers in California I know youre out of town today Wonder if you can give me a quick call to explain it was it not making enough money is it related to the PUC putting da on the June agenda and how many customers you have in California Cheers Kate Kate Berry Reporter The Orange County Register w c
